description: Troy Knott is the Founder and CEO of Spring Digital, Inc. Working as an in-house and freelance web designer and digital marketer from over a decade ago, Troy formally launched the boutique digital marketing firm as Spring SEO, Inc. in 2014. Since then, he has worked with dozens of B2C and B2B clients helping to build their brands. Through his hands-on expertise in digital marketing, Troy assists in building the online presence for companies small to large with a strong focus in direct response and acquisition-based marketing. Troy is a strong business development professional skilled in search engine optimization (SEO), digital advertising, sales, web design, management, and digital strategy. He leads business development and client interaction for Spring Digital. Troy holds a B.S. from the University California at Berkeley and a M.A. from the University of Hawai'i at Manoa.
bio: Troy Knott is the founder and CEO of Spring Digital, Inc., a full-service digital marketing agency. He works with a wide array of businesses to help them realize their growth potential. With decades of experience spanning multiple degrees, publications, speaking engagements, presentations, and client workshops, Troy leads with education and in-depth research to provide a fun yet serious perspective. As the leader of a multifaceted digital marketing agency, Troy's varied interests allow him to speak to the many marketing and business development pain points his clients face. Troy starts from a goals-first perspective to develop complete marketing strategies for his clients. This important distinction allows Troy and his team to produce executable engagements that produce the results their clients require, where others rely on simple services hoping a one-size fits all approach. As a seasoned veteran in digital marketing, Troy knows each business is unique and requires personalized understandings and marketing to truly help accelerate their growth. Troy regularly presents at conferences and local Chamber events on how businesses can improve their visibility and conversion results through effective local marketing tactics. He is a regular guest on numerous podcasts discussing usage of AI tools and how his team builds custom AI tools for their clients. Troy's writings can be found at the Growth Resource Center in Spring Digital's website, where he publishes articles on marketing strategies, leadership, and how agencies help businesses grow.
